alanMistakes: Alan nwere ike imehie. Jiri amamihe dọkịta.
name: Aha
passwordErrorMsg: Paswọọdụ ezighi ezi. Biko nwalee ọzọ
noCodeLine: Enweghị koodu ma ọ bụ koodu ezighi ezi? Kpọtụrụ anyị
eyeMarqueeLine2: Kedu ka m ga-esi hụ optic disc site na Arclight?
eyeMarqueeLine3: Nwoke 25, anya uhie, ụbọchị 3, ọkụ na-ewute ya, VA ada ntakịrị
eyeMarqueeLine5: Ò kwesị ka m zipu congenital cataract ngwa ngwa?
eyeMarqueeLine6: Nwanyị 65, ọhụụ adịghị mma, enweghị gilaasi. Ihu anya dị mma, pupil gbara ọchịchịrị
eyeMarqueeLine7: Nne na-echegbu onwe ya: nwa hụrụ pupil ọcha, enweghị ọhụụ n’anya ahụ.
earMarqueeLine2: Ò nwere ike ịhụ tympanic membrane site na Arclight m?
earMarqueeLine3: Nwa okorobịa 16, pinna na-afụ ụfụ ụbọchị 2, na-akụcha, ịnụ ihe dị mma
earMarqueeLine5: Ò kwesị ka m zipu mastoiditis ngwa ngwa?
earMarqueeLine6: Nwoke 73, ịnụ ihe adịghị mma. Anaghị m ahụ canal nke ọma; naanị wax ka m hụrụ
earMarqueeLine7: Nwa enweghị azịza mgbe a na-akpọ ya. Ọ gachala ọnwa
geoInfoText: Mgbe ị pịrị "Geolocation", a ga-ekekọrịta ebe ziri ezi (lat/long). Nke a na-enyere ka e nye nduzi na nhọrọ ka mma.
frontOfEyeText:
Lelee ma tụnyere anya: n’ihu, aka nri, aka ekpe, elu, ala
Jide ma bịaruo nso. Nyochaa: lids, conjunctiva, cornea, pupil
Jiri fluoro maka corneal ulcers ma ọ bụ scratches
fundalReflexText:
Ọchịchịrị ntakịrị n’ime ụlọ, nwa dị jụụ; n’ogo aka – tụnyere reflexes
Ha hà: Brightness, Colour, Shape
Bịaruo nso ịhụ nke ọma: Scar, cataract, RB, Vit Haem
backOfEyeText:
Jiri anya aka nri lelee anya aka nri onye ọrịa; aka ekpe maka aka ekpe
Onye ọrịa ga-ele n’ihu, Ọ BỤGHỊ n’ìhè; bịaruo nso chọta optic disc (Dilate = best view)
Nyochaa disc: Margin, Colour, Cup. Soro nnukwu vessels, mgbe ahụ gwa onye ọrịa ka o lee ìhè ozugbo iji hụ macula
additionalText_eye:
Mara discs: normal, swollen, new vessels, cupped, pale
>Mee omume ugboro ugboro<
allAroundEarText:
Lelee: pinna, tragus, mastoid maka lumps, tenderness ma ọ bụ discharge
Gbalịa mee ka pinna kwaga nwayọ, hụ ma ọ na-afụ ụfụ
earCanalText:
Tụgharịa isi, jide Arclight dịka pen
Dọkpụ pinna elu/azụ (ndị okenye) ma ọ bụ ala/azụ (ụmụaka)
Tinye speculum (4.5mm adult, 2.5mm infant), kpụpụ ntutu, tụgharịa ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa
Chọọ: wax, debris, infection
tympanicMembraneText:
Chọpụta handle of malleus, light reflex, attic
Lezienụ: colour, position, translucency
Chọọ perforation, fluid ma ọ bụ scarring
additionalText_ear:
Mara TMs: normal, red, bulging, retracted, perforated
>Mee omume ugboro ugboro<
generalObservationText:
Lelee lumps, mgbanwe agba, na mgbasa
Metụ nwayọ ka ị chọpụta texture, okpomọkụ ma ọ bụ tenderness
uvLightText:
N’ime ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị, lelee characteristic fluorescence:
tinea (blue-green), pityriasis versicolor (coppery-orange), erythrasma (coral-red), vitiligo (blue-white), acne (orange-red), head lice nits (pale-blue)
dermoscopyText:
Jide Arclight polariser dịka pen, nyochaa: ABCDE (Asymmetry, Border, Colour, Diameter >6mm, Evolving)
Nyochaa: PDSBV (Pigment network, Dots, Streaks, Blue-white, Vascular)
additionalText_skin:
Mara lesion: normal, suspicious, inflamed
>Mee omume ugboro ugboro<
aboutAlanText:
Alan bụ ngwá ọrụ mmụta AI maka anya, ntị na akpụkpọ, nke mejupụtara: foundation language model na symbolic logic. Smart. Serious. State of the art.

Clinical, local knowledge na images, e haziri ha maka ọrụ dị iche iche dịka ndị ọrụ ahụike na general practitioners. Mkparịta ụka dị mkpirikpi na-enye teaching diagnosis na management plan. A na-etinye Arclight n’ime ihe niile.
instructionsIntro: Alan bụ ngwá ọrụ ọmụmụ AI maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị na-ahụ naanị mgbe ụfọdụ nsogbu anya, ntị ma ọ bụ akpụkpọ. Dee nke ọma ma zere itinye aha ma ọ bụ nkọwa na-akọwa onye ọrịa. Lelee nke ọma gburugburu isi/ihu/akụkụ ahụ ma nyochaa anya/ntị abụọ. Chioma!
instructionsPatientPrompt: Gwa Alan gbasara onye ọrịa gị:
instructionsUseArclight_default: Jiri Arclight: ihu, fundal reflex, azụ anya.
instructionsJustRight_eye: Nwoke 25, anya uhie ụbọchị 3. Enweghị ọgwụ ma ọ bụ nsogbu anya tupu. Mgbu, anya na-asa mmiri, white cornea dot. Pupils OK, Vision 6/12 6/6 other
instructionsTooMuch_eye: Nwoke a bịara ụlọ ọgwụ taa. O gbara ụgbọala banye n’ụlọ ahụ ka anya ya na-acha uhie, ugbu a ọ na-eche na nri o riri metụtara anya ya. A na-ahụ watering na red edges. Ọ chọrọ enyemaka. Nwoke ogologo, watery eyes, na-echegbu cornea na mgbu. Ọ sịrị, "What is this?"
instructionsAdditionalQuery_eye: Alan na-aza ajụjụ mmụta anya: Gịnị bụ Iritis? Kedu ka m ga-esi hụ retina?
instructionsJustRight_ear: Nwoke 25, ntị uhie ụbọchị 3. Enweghị ọgwụ ma ọ bụ nsogbu ntị tupu. Mgbu, ear discharge. Red drum, hearing muffled in bad ear but OK other.
instructionsTooMuch_ear: Nwoke a bịara ụlọ ọgwụ taa. O gbara ụgbọala banye n’ụlọ ahụ ka ntị ya na-acha uhie, ugbu a ọ na-eche na nri o riri metụtara ntị ya. A na-ahụ discharge na red edges. Ọ chọrọ enyemaka. Nwoke ogologo, watery ears, na-echegbu hearing na mgbu. Ọ sịrị, "What is this?"
instructionsAdditionalQuery_ear: Alan na-aza ajụjụ mmụta ntị: Gịnị bụ Otitis Media? Kedu ka m ga-esi sachaa ntị?
instructionsJustRight_skin: Nwoke 25, red skin patch ụbọchị 3. Enweghị ọgwụ ma ọ bụ nsogbu akpụkpọ tupu. Sore and itchy.
instructionsTooMuch_skin: Nwoke a bịara ụlọ ọgwụ taa. O gbara ụgbọala banye n’ụlọ ahụ ka akpụkpọ ya na-acha uhie, ugbu a ọ na-eche na nri o riri metụtara akpụkpọ ya. A na-ahụ watering na red edges. Ọ chọrọ enyemaka. Nwoke ogologo, red skin, na-echegbu pigment na irritation. Ọ sịrị, "What is this?"
instructionsAdditionalQuery_skin: Alan na-aza ajụjụ mmụta akpụkpọ: Gịnị bụ Eczema? Kedu ka m ga-esi hụ pigment network?
instructionText: Alan bụ ngwá ọrụ ọmụmụ AI maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị na-ahụ naanị mgbe ụfọdụ nsogbu anya, ntị ma ọ bụ akpụkpọ. Dee nke ọma ma zere itinye aha ma ọ bụ nkọwa na-akọwa onye ọrịa.
